title: Bitcoin Briefly Tops $49K Before Selling Off as ETF Trading Frenzy Commences
description: Bitcoin hit its highest price in more than two years Thursday before it fell back to $46,000 as the highly anticipated spot bitcoin ETF debut unleashed volatility.

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Could Attract a Record $3B Inflow in First Trading Day: CF Benchmarks
description: The fund saw about $400 million of inflows within 30 minutes of its trading debut, CF Benchmarks said.

title: Bitcoin ETFs Are Here—When Ethereum ETF?
description: After the historic approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF on Wednesday, analysts say a spot ETH ETF could be imminent.

title: Bitcoin’s brief rally to $49k and subsequent decline to $46k liquidates $100M in 4 hours
description:
Bitcoin (BTC) experienced significant volatility following the launch of the first spot BTC exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the United States. BTC surged above the $49,000 threshold, marking its highest level since December 2021, immediately after these ETFs began trading. However, the cryptocurrency rapidly declined almost 4% within the one-hour candle, plummeting to around $46,000, as […]

The post Bitcoin’s brief rally to $49k and subsequent decline to $46k liquidates $100M in 4 hours appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Hedera and Algorand Forge Alliance for Decentralized Wallet Recovery
description: In a significant development for the blockchain industry, Hedera and Algorand have joined forces to address a critical need in the digital asset space: decentralized recovery of digital assets.  The collaboration has led to the formation of the DeRec Alliance and the introduction of an open-source protocol aimed at enhancing the security and recovery processes […]

title: South Korea is not impressed by US approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs
description: Despite the United States embracing the innovative stride of approving a spot Bitcoin ETF, South Korea remains unswayed. The East Asian powerhouse holds firm to its stance, unwavering in the face of what is considered a very important moment in cryptocurrency’s mainstream acceptance. Their unwavering position reflects a deep-rooted caution, demonstrating that not all global […]

title: Top 5 Budget Gaming Mice to Elevate Your Gaming Experience
description: In the world of gaming, investing in a high-end gaming rig can strain your budget, often leaving gamers looking to cut costs on peripherals like the mouse. title: BONK: Trader Goes Long on Dogecoin Rival Once Again
description: A BONK whale has accumulated a massive quantity of the token in a long-term bullish bet. Whale embrace of crypto is beginning to take the stage in the ecosystem.
